Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the TFPI-1 C-terminal peptide
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.29183811] Gram-positive bacteria:Micrococcus luteus (MIC=9 μM; MBC=18 μM), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=4 μM; MBC=8 μM);Gram-negative bacterium:Vibrio vulnificus (MIC= 80 μM; MBC=80 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria.

Literature.Title: TO17 A teleost antimicrobial peptide that induces degradation of bacterial nucleic acids and inhibits bacterial infection in red drum, Sciaenops ocellatus.
Literature.Author: He SW, Wang GH, Yue B, Zhou S, Zhang M.
